ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... will ... Hi there. Unfortunately, every time I log into this group, there isn t much going on, other than people trying to get you to go to an EQ
ygData.messageBody:
> Being fairly new to this whole Everquest thing I need all the help
> and guidance I can get.
> So far I´ve reached the 9th level, and I´m looking for new quests
> take me even higher.
>
> I take it most of you have beena round a lot longer than me so I
will
> probably just be a silent "lurker" to begin with.


Hi there. Unfortunately, every time I log into this group, there
isn't much going on, other than people trying to get you to go to an
EQ commercial site... No real discussion going on either :( For
anyone that's interested, I've put up a site for EQ, my MAIN (47
Paladin), and Paladins... It's called, "The Paladin's Club", and
it's not for the shy of heart (some background pics are a bit racey,
but they're all from famous artists lol) All Pallies are invited,
there's a message board there, that does NOT require membership,
which we can use to discuss stuff. also compiling all the quest info
for pallies there. Don't have much reaady yet on the quests, but I
DO have the Ghoulbane part up :) http://www.members.cox.net/karmana

Aeileron SilverLeaf, Holy Warrior of Tunare
Povar- Steeldragons
